content.body: For me VSCode enforces the rules from editorConfig, some IDE enforce it built in so it is useful to have
content.formatted_body: For me VSCode enforces the rules from editorConfig, some IDE enforce it built in so it is useful to have

content.body: You’re right in that there’s no tooling on the project side to check it’s being enforced but I don’t think it’s for that. That being said I think Prettier respects it
